This is the default constructor for Launcher.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class run.Launcher
The main method that serves as the entry point for running a console application to explore the DAO software pattern and Singleton Design Pattern.

This is the default constructor for RecipientDTO.

This is the default constructor for RecipientsBusinessLogic.
RecipientsDao - Interface in dataaccesslayer
This interface defines the methods that DAO class is supposed to implement.

This class as the data access object implements the methods defined by its interface.
